content: the unicorn mandala such a versatile pattern the name originated from the lovely soft pastels i have used to make the mandala and then turn it into a dreamcatcher the great thing about this pattern is that you can use any yarn you want with any size hook i have used 6 different colours for the mandala featured in this pattern but you can use as many as you like or have/ want this pattern has 15 rounds in total with photos to better explain stitch placement it can be kept as a doily or mounted on a hoop to make a wall hanging whatever you feel any issues and im here to help just send me an email craftyhookup@gmail com
